Related repos

  • Collection of papers, datasets, and code on debiasing recommender systems
  • Generates media recommendations from server libraries using language models
  • PyTorch code for language modeling book
  • Downloads YouTube videos and playlists
  • automates media recommendations and download requests for Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby
  • PyTorch deep learning course files and code notebooks
  • curated list of Go libraries and tools
